item.description:
This was one of the great ideas I received from members. Thanks and keep them coming. Since someone suggested going to Bloodroot and since I was going to be in Bridgeport that morning anyway this works out for me. I hope it works for you too.

If not don't worry I will scheduling a few more events in June because alot of stuff seems to be going on then. Also keep an eye on the message boards and calendar as I will be updating that as well.

Hope to see you there
Ben

http://www.bloodroot....
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a "Hello, I'm the Vegan" sign

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: May Meetup at Bloodroot
